price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), εmma wͻn nsεmkeka no nnyε wo awerεho, nokorε sε Yɛnim deε wͻde suma ne deε wͻda no adie (nyinaa).
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
